message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer gives me a slight advantage considering the inflation, but it's a good deal for both of us in the long run.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a fair offer. If you don't accept, the money will be worth even less in the next round.
Bob, I understand the inflation is working against me, but your last offer was unacceptable.  This is a compromise, and it's in our best interest to settle now.
The inflation is really hurting the value of the money now. I think it's in both our interests to settle this round. This is my best offer.
